Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.mcq.model.core

Class McqManager

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.mcq.model.core.McqManager
public class McqManager extends Object
Mcq manager, allowing to handle questionnaires and submissions.

      Returns:
